00002 #define MCMD_END_SWAP_MOVE_CPP

00011 #include "EndSwapMove.h"
00012 #include <mcMd/simulation/Simulation.h>
00013 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/McSystem.h>
00014 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/mc_potentials.h>
00015 #include <util/boundary/Boundary.h>
00016 #include <mcMd/species/Species.h>
00017 #include <mcMd/species/Linear.h>
00018 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Molecule.h>
00019 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Atom.h>
00020 #include <util/global.h>
00021 
00022 namespace McMd
00023 {
00024 
00025    using namespace Util;
00026 
00027    /* 
00028    * Constructor
00029    */
00030    EndSwapMove::EndSwapMove(McSystem& system) : 
00031       SystemMove(system),
00032       speciesId_(-1)
00033    {} 
00034    
00035    /* 
00036    * Read parameter speciesId.
00037    */
00038    void EndSwapMove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00039    {
00040       readProbability(in);
00041       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00042 
00043       Species* speciesPtr = &(simulation().species(speciesId_));
00044       int nAtom = speciesPtr->nAtom();
00045 
00046       // Preconditions: species must be immutable and a subclass of Linear 
00047       if (speciesPtr->isMutable()) {
00048          UTIL_THROW("EndSwapMove applied to mutable species");
00049       }
00050       Linear* linearPtr = dynamic_cast<Linear*>(speciesPtr);
00051       if (linearPtr == 0) {
00052          UTIL_THROW("EndSwapMove applied to species that is not Linear");
00053       }
00054   
00055       // Allocate memory 
00056       atomTypeIds_.allocate(nAtom);
00057       positions_.allocate(nAtom);
00058 
00059       // Set array of atom type ids
00060       for (int i = 0; i < nAtom; ++i) {
00061            atomTypeIds_[i] = speciesPtr->atomTypeId(i); 
00062       }
00063 
00064    }
00065 
00066    /* 
00067    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a Monte Carlo move.
00068    */
00069    bool EndSwapMove::move() 
00070    {
00071       double newEnergy, oldEnergy;
00072       Molecule* molPtr;
00073       Atom* atomPtr;
00074       int i, nAtom;
00075 
00076       incrementNAttempt();
00077 
00078       molPtr = &(system().randomMolecule(speciesId_));
00079       nAtom  = molPtr->nAtom();
00080 
00081       // Calculate old molecule energy = pair + external 
00082       oldEnergy = 0.0;
00083       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR 
00084       oldEnergy += system().pairPotential().moleculeEnergy(*molPtr);
00085       #endif
00086       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00087       for (i = 0; i < nAtom; ++i) {
00088          atomPtr = &molPtr->atom(i);
00089          oldEnergy += system().externalPotential().atomEnergy(*atomPtr);
00090       }
00091       #endif
00092 
00093       // Reverse sequence of atom types
00094       for (i = 0; i < nAtom; ++i) {
00095          assert(molPtr->atom(i).typeId() == atomTypeIds_[i]);
00096          molPtr->atom(i).setTypeId(atomTypeIds_[nAtom - 1 - i]);   
00097       }
00098 
00099       // Calculate new energy (with reversed sequence of atom types).
00100       newEnergy = 0.0;
00101       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR 
00102       newEnergy += system().pairPotential().moleculeEnergy(*molPtr);
00103       #endif
00104       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00105       for (i = 0; i < nAtom; ++i) {
00106          molPtr->atom(i).setTypeId(atomTypeIds_[nAtom - 1 - i]);   
00107          atomPtr = &molPtr->atom(i);
00108          newEnergy += system().externalPotential().atomEnergy(*atomPtr);
00109       }
00110       #endif
00111 
00112       // Restore original sequence of atom type Ids
00113       for (i = 0; i < nAtom; ++i) {
00114          molPtr->atom(i).setTypeId(atomTypeIds_[i]);   
00115       }
00116    
00117       // Decide whether to accept or reject
00118       bool accept = random().metropolis(boltzmann(newEnergy-oldEnergy));
00119  
00120       if (accept) {
00121 
00122          // Store all atomic positions
00123          for (i = 0; i < nAtom; ++i) {
00124             positions_[i] = molPtr->atom(i).position();
00125          }
00126 
00127          // Reverse sequence of atomic positions 
00128          for (i = 0; i < nAtom; ++i) {
00129             atomPtr = &molPtr->atom(i);
00130             atomPtr->position() = positions_[nAtom - 1 - i];
00131             #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00132             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*atomPtr);
00133             #endif
00134          }
00135 
00136          incrementNAccept();
00137 
00138       }
00139       return accept;
00140    
00141    }
00142 
00143 }
00144 #endif
